Door
public class Door extends Object

    Constructs a door connecting two rooms.

  • Constructor Details

    • Door

      public Door(Room r1, Room r2)
      Constructs a door connecting two rooms.
      Parameters:
      r1 - The first room.
      r2 - The second room.

  • Method Details

    • canEnter

      public boolean canEnter(Permit permit)
      Determines if a permit can pass through the door into the target room.
      Parameters:
      permit - The permit trying to use the door.
      Returns:
      true if the permit is allowed to enter the connected room, false otherwise.

    • useDoor

      public boolean useDoor(Permit permit)
      Attempts to use the door to move the permit to the connected room.
      Parameters:
      permit - The permit attempting to pass through the door.
      Returns:
      true if the move was successful, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the door.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string showing which rooms the door connects.

    • getRoom1

      public Room getRoom1()
      Returns the first room.

    • getRoom2

      public Room getRoom2()
      Returns the second room.
